name: Lichess Board Themes
description:
This theme will allow you to change the color of the themes: To use them, you must go lichess, and go to the top right and click on your username, then click on boad theme, there you can chose many default themes, but to use my themes, this is how:
click on the theme name to access my boards

blue1 = blue

blue2 = darkerblue

blue3 = teal

green = green

green-plastic = emeraldGreen

purple = purple

purple-diag = darker teal

pink = red

ic = yellow

brown = brown
